TopicTitle: Fanwork Friday: South Park Space Program

Articles.Content: Sand- Oh my god, they killed Kenny! It looked like just another day in South Park, until Kenny Kerman was crashed by a command pod while waiting on the bus to the Space Center. Fortunately Kenny famously refuses to remain dead and weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re sure that after taking a few sick days weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll see him back in action next week, ready for his next mission, which Deviant artist Sandwich-Anomaly claims will have him visit the Sun. Check out Sandwich-AnomalyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Deviantart page [http://sandwich-anomaly.deviantart.com/art/South-Park-Space-Program-526596706](**HERE**.

Do we need all their names as Kerbals, now?

I think so!

Hey! Kenny is my top pilot!

I suspect Jeb planned all of this!

No, seriously, i have a pilot called Kenny Kerman, and i like him alot.
